tasks.label: C++ Watch and Run
tasks.command: bash -c 'compile_and_run() { clear; pkill -f "${workspaceFolder}/main.o" 2>/dev/null; g++-15 -std=c++98 -pedantic-errors -Wall -Werror -o ${workspaceFolder}/main.o "$1" && ${workspaceFolder}/main.o & }; compile_and_run "$1"; fswatch -o "$1" | while read; do compile_and_run "$1"; done' _ ${file}
